#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
const int INF = 1000005;
class LISARRAY
{
private:
	int* input;
	int* prev;
	int longest;
	int var;
public:
	void binarysearch(int x)
	{
		int low = 1;
		int high = longest;
		while (low <= high)
		{
			int mid = (low + high) / 2;
			if (input[mid] >= x)
				high = mid - 1;
			else
				low = mid + 1;
		}
		input[++high] = x;
		if (high > longest)
			longest = high;
	}
	void getinput()
	{
		cin >> var;
		int i = 1;
		input = new int[var];
		input[0] = (INF);
		longest = 0;
		for (int i = 1; i <= var; i++)
		{
			int x;
			cin >> x;
			x -= i;
			if (x >= 0)
				binarysearch(x);
		}
	}
	void Display()
	{
		cout <<var-longest<< endl;
	}
};
int main()
{
	LISARRAY obj;
	obj.getinput();
	obj.Display();
		// system("pause");
	return 0;
}
